column5: There has been a change in plans regarding visitation and funeral service as of 1:00 pm Sunday.  There will be NO VISITATION ON MONDAY Jan. 21  Instead, visitation will take place Tues., Jan 22 from noon to 1 pm. at the funeral home with a celebration of Rolf's life to follow after at that location.  The funeral home can be accessed at www.donaldvbrown.ca ; this information will appear on that site in an updated obituary notice. Directions to the funeral home are available at that site. This information is also available at the Wishmaster site:- http://www.wishmasterbigbaits.com/  Please share this information with others.
It has to do with this...
Thanks Cliff. Sorry for your loss Rick.
